description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**General English II**

**Spring 2022**

**Mondays, 10:20 @ S 404**

**Instructor: Yuchun Huang** **黃郁珺** [**maverick.glider.ntnu@gmail.com**](mailto:maverick.glider.ntnu@gmail.com)

**Objectives**: This general English course is designed to enhance students’ reading, writing, listening and speaking skills. Students will be given the opportunity to develop these 4 language skills along with critical thinking skills by presenting them with ideas around the world and collaborative activities in the classroom.

**Required Textbook:** _Keynote 4_

**Course Requirements**

**Attendance and Participation 30%**

You are expected to work in pairs and in groups. Be a responsible partner. Finish what you need to finish before coming to the class.

Punctual attendance and active participation are essential. Points will be deducted for being late. If absences occur more than 4 times for no reasons, credits for this course will not be granted. If you have to miss a class, please inform me and your group partners in advance.

**Midterm: 3-Minute Presentation ABC 20%**

依據師大 3分鐘英語簡報競賽規則，根據指定聯合國永續發展目標 (SDGs)

oA. Presentation script + 1 Slide 7% + 3%

oB. Oral Presentation 10%: 3 minutes in class, **memorized**

oC. Upload to Moodle: 1 file that includes both your presentation script and 1 slide.

**TOEIC Listening & Reading NTNU Campus Test 20%+**

oA. L & R Test Participation 10% (\*請自行查詢各系英文畢業門檻) B1: 550/ B2: 785

oB. Study Journal 10%: Hard copy. The study journal can include your vocabulary bank, the

online resources you used, the login record of practice test etc. You may present QRs or links to

your cloud drive. Submit ONLY 1 piece of paper (2 pages at most).

oC. Bonus 5%+: TOECI Speaking & Writing Test participation (L & R 達B2者免費報名)

**Culture Exchange 10%**

        Show and tell something about Taiwan to international students. Work as a group. This will be

partially graded by the international students.

**Reading Journals 10%**

Submit a reading journal for either U4 or U9. Typed, double-spaced, hard copy.

The journal should include:

1\. Summary of the reading, 1 paragraph. Use your own sentences.

2\. Vocabulary and phrases (definition and example sentences, 5 items in total)

3\. Discussion (Question + Your and your group’s response), 1 paragraph

**Final Oral Test 10%**

**Bonus 5%+**

Participation in English activities on or off campus, including 3-minute Presentation Contest,

NTNU English Chat Rooms, TOEIC workshops, Lexile Reading etc.請見師大共教外文組網站
